com.stripe.android.view.i18n

Class TranslatorManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stripe.android.view.i18n.TranslatorManager

  • public class TranslatorManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that provides a ErrorMessageTranslator for translating server-provided error messages, as defined in Stripe API Errors Reference. See PaymentMethodsActivity for example usage. To use a custom ErrorMessageTranslator in your app, override Application.onCreate() in your app's Application subclass and call setErrorMessageTranslator(ErrorMessageTranslator). 
     
 public class MyApp extends Application {
   public void onCreate() {
     super.onCreate();
     TranslatorManager.setErrorMessageTranslator(new MyErrorMessageTranslator());
   }
 }
